issue.title: [C++] Implement kernel function that converts a dense array to dictionary given known dictionary
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1574](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1574). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This may simply be a special case of cast using a dictionary type

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1574?focusedCommentId=16761442) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Values not found in the dictionary become null

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1574?focusedCommentId=17116054) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This would be a useful expansion of the functions in vector_hash.cc. We must introduce a `HashOptions` to be able to supply the known dictionary when invoking the functions
